Translations.Text: Vuga uti:- twaremeye Imana y’ukuri hamwe nivyo twamanuriwe nivyo yamanuriwe intumwa y'Imana Ibrahimu (iii) na Ismaili (iii) hamwe na Is’haka (iii) na Ya’akubu (iii) hamwe n’ibibondo vyiwe, hamwe n’ivyo yahawe intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) na Issa mwene Mariyamu (iii) hamwe n’izindi ntumwa zivuye ku Muremyi wabo, natwe ntituvangura hagati yabo n’umuntu n’umwe, natwe tugamburukiye kuri yo
N’uwushaka idini atari idini rya Isilamu, ntirizo kwemererwa kuriwe nayo k’umusi w’imperuka azoba ari muruhombo runiniya cane

Mbega Imana izorongora gute abantu bayihakanye munyuma yaho bamaze kwemera kwabo n’ukuba ivyabona y’uko intumwa y’Imana ari iy’ukuri n’ugushikirwa n’ivyemezo biri k’umugaragaro, rero Imana ntirongora abantu bahemukira imitima yabo
Abo bantu impembo yabo nuko hejuru yabo hari umuvumo w’Imana hamwe nuw’Abamarayika hamwe nuw’abantu bose
Muri uwo muriro udahera bazowuba mwo mubuzima bwabo bwose, kandi ntibazo gabanirizwa ibihano canke ngo baronswe n’akanya k’ukuruhuka
Dukuye mwo abasavye ikigongwe munyuma y’ivyo n’ukugira ibikorwa vyabo, mu vy’ukuri Imana niyo ifise imbabazi nyinshi n’impuhwe zihagije
Mu vy’ukuri bamwe bahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri bamaze kuyemera hanyuma bakabandanya bahakana, ikigongwe cabo ntikizo kwemererwa na gatoyi, n’abo nibo bazimiye bimwe vy’ukuri

Mu vy’ukuri bamwe bahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri hanyuma bakitaba Imana yabo nabo ari abahakanyi b’Imana, rero ntihazo kwemererwa umuntu uwariwe wese naho yoba yatanze ingwati y’inzahabu y’ukwuzuza iy’Isi yose, abo bantu nibo bazoronka ibihano bibabaza kandi ntibazoronka abafasha
